title: What are some examples of animals using intelligence in the wild? - Quora

response.answer_text: The fact that you wrote this question (1) humans are animals (2) i’m assuming you are not locked up therefore you represent an animal in the wild exhibiting a degree of intelligence
The Praying Mantis seeking and leading other insects. The Bonobo monkeys having sexual intercourse. Dolphins clicking with… is it infrasound? Can’t remember…
